pages.title: Break Out
pages.text: When PlantCards have $(bred)Break Out$() Enchantment, every time the card summons a plant, it will give the plant a chance to be super mode.$()ã€‚Its max lvl is 4, $(l)10% for lvl 1, 13% for 2, 16% for 3, and 20% for lvl 4$().

pages.title: Energy Transfer
pages.text: When Swords have $(bred)Energy Transfer$() Enchantment, Players can right click plants to cosume energy num and make plants in super mode. Its max lvl is 1.

pages.title: Charm
pages.text: When PlantCards have $(bred)Charm$() Enchantment, The plant summoned will be charmed and attack its owner. Its max lvl is 1.

pages.title: Sun Shovel
pages.text: When Shovels have $(bred)Sun Shovel$() Enchantment, the plants it shoveled will give some sun back. Its max lvl is 5.

pages.title: Sun Mending
pages.text: Similar to Mending, when tools have $(bred)Sun Mending$() Enchantment, Player can fix their tools when collide with sun. Its max lvl is 5.

pages.title: Soilless Plant
pages.text: When PlantCards have $(bred)Soilless Plant$() Enchantment, the plants summoned are able to survive on every block. Its max lvl is 1.

pages.title: Densely Plant
pages.text: When PlantCards have $(bred)Densely Plant$() Enchantment, it can place 10 more each level before reach count limit.

pages.title: Immediate CD
pages.text: When PlantCards have $(bred)Immediate CD$() Enchantment, card have chance to only have 1 second cool down.
